name: UIScene.ActivationRequestOptions
desc: An object that contains information you want the system to use when activating the session associated with a scene.

items.name: var requestingScene: UIScene?
items.desc: The scene object that requested the activation of a different scene.

items.name: var collectionJoinBehavior: UISceneCollectionJoinBehavior
items.desc: The behavior that specifies how a new scene joins a scene collection.

items.name: enum UISceneCollectionJoinBehavior
items.desc: A set of behaviors that specify how a new scene joins a scene collection.
